QueryResult.text: SELECT C.NAME, C.DESCRIPTION, C.LANGUAGE_CODE, P.ID, P.STEP_ID, P.ACTION_CODE, P.TYPE_CODE, P.OBJECT_NAME, P.OBJECT_METHOD, P.AI_SUBJECT, P.AI_DESCRIPTION, P.AI_PRIORITY, P.AI_USER_STATUS_ONLY, P.AI_DUEIN_INTERVAL, P.AI_DUEIN_TYPE_CODE, P.AI_REMINDER_TYPE_CODE, P.AI_REMINDER_INTERVAL, P.AI_CLOSE, P.JOB_DEFINITION_ID, P.JOB_ID, SCRIPT_ID, SUBPROCESS_ID, P.SUBPROCESS_INIT_OBJECT_KEY, P.SYNCHRONIZED, P.INDEPENDENT, P.SEQUENCE, P.NOTIFY_WHEN, P.NOTIFY_OWNER, P.CREATED_DATE, P.CREATED_BY, P.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, P.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM BPM_DEF_STEP_ACTIONS p, CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS c WHERE p.id = c.pk_id and c.table_name = 'BPM_DEF_STEP_ACTIONS'
